## About the database

The [Lahman database](http://www.seanlahman.com/baseball-archive/statistics/) is maintained by Sean Lahman, and contains seasonal information about [Major League Baseball](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Major_League_Baseball) dating back to 1871. If you have any questions about baseball, just ask!

Download the latest version of the database [here](http://seanlahman.com/files/database/lahman-sql_2015-01-24.zip)

## R version

There is also a version of the Lahman database pacakged for R. To use it, try:

```{r, eval=FALSE}
install.packages("Lahman")
library(Lahman)
```
